alert.note: Alert for St. Clair (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 10:39AM EST until further notice by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST SUNDAY... ...REPLACES FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by rain and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...St Clair County * WHEN...Until noon EST Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1034 AM EST, Emergency management reported flooding along the Black RIver in Port Huron and Fort Gratiot. - Flooding impacts will continue, but no additional rainfall is expected today. - Locations most impacted are along the Black River and Mill Creek, especially in Port Huron. - Additional rivers and streams are running high in the rest of the county. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
